column5: heading up to nosbonsing this weekend. any one with experience on this lake have any tips or hot spots, baits, lures? would love to hook an musky! heading up friday early AM and staying on the lake for the weekend.
Use the OFC search for Nosbonsing... Probably the best place to start. Good luck, that lake can be tough sometimes.
Troll with some big baits. Stay well pout from the weed lines and aim for 16-20 fow. Try rocky points for walleye.

Ill be going after musky on NOS on the long weekend. I dont have much advice other than dont talk to the locals, I mean the locals are nice but dont like you fishing their lake, from my experience and i grew up in North Bay. Good musky fishing tho,, big too!!
